name: Dear Leader's Diet Plan
description:
You must be this thin to enter Best Korea.

Dear Leader of Best Korea must prove to his countrymen that he is a true communist and lose weight before he gets crushed by the capitalist walls…

Bounce Kim into the walls to help purge him of the captialist propaganda he’s been consuming, and jump back into Best Korea once he’s thin enough.

---

Made in ~48 hours for Ludum Dare 42.

---
